chapter_description.p: The Sparse Type module provides tools for creating and manipulating sparse matrices in Nelson.

It supports efficient storage and computation for matrices with a large number of zero elements, including conversion between sparse and full representations, generation of special sparse matrices, and access to nonzero elements.
This module enables memory-efficient handling of large datasets and optimized numerical operations on sparse structures.

keyword.name: IJV
keyword.description: Returns I,J,V triplets from a sparse matrix.

keyword.name: nnz
keyword.description: Return the number of nonzero elements.

keyword.name: spones
keyword.description: Replaces non zero sparse matrix elements with ones.
